bwwExcerpt: 'Chaplin,' the bio-musical that opened Monday night at the Ethel Barrymore Theatre, is a mixture of the imaginative and the timeworn. The good things in it begin with Rob McClure’s deft performance in the title role — at times presented on film, in the style of a vintage movie.

keyPhrases.quote: 'Chaplin' is a mixture of the imaginative and the timeworn.
